messages.subject: less structure
messages.msgSnippet: Karen wrote: I am getting better at being more of a facilitator when it comes to my kids, as opposed to being the teacher.  It has not been easy after having
messages.messageBody:
Karen wrote:
I am getting better at being more of a facilitator when it comes to my
kids, as opposed to being
the teacher. It has not been easy after having taught school for 10yrs. I
have had to "de-school", and unlearn some things-- and it's been tough at
times! ~



We've been hsing for about 7 mos. and, while I've never done "school at
home", I do waffle back and forth between some structure and unschooling.
As you were a teacher for 10 years, Karen, I'd be very interested in
hearing what made you decide to go with unschooling.

Thanks.

Maureen
